trans-unit.source: Memo records that are generated from intraday bank statements.

seg-source.mrk: Memo records that are generated from intraday bank statements.

target.mrk: 在当天银行对账单中生成的备忘录。

trans-unit.source: Intraday memo records are automatically generated from intraday bank statements.

seg-source.mrk: Intraday memo records are automatically generated from intraday bank statements.

target.mrk: 日内备忘录是在当天银行对账单中自动生成的。

    You can enable the system to automatically post billing documents in the billing settings. You can also enable the system to create a separate billing document for each billing request in the billing settings. If you enable both settings, the system automatically converts all billing requests that you have selected into billing documents and posts them to your customers.

trans-unit.source: Intraday memo records are assigned with the <sap-technical-name>INTRAM</sap-technical-name> certainty level.

seg-source.mrk: Intraday memo records are assigned with the <sap-technical-name>INTRAM</sap-technical-name> certainty level.

target.mrk: 使用确定性级别 <sap-technical-name>INTRAM</sap-technical-name> 分配日内备忘录。

trans-unit.source: You can use this app to reconcile intraday memo records with forecasted cash flows. It enables you to identify unfinished and unknown payments in time. It also helps you get rid of duplicated items in forecasts to gain a more accurate account of your cash positions.

seg-source.mrk: You can use this app to reconcile intraday memo records with forecasted cash flows.
It enables you to identify unfinished and unknown payments in time.
It also helps you get rid of duplicated items in forecasts to gain a more accurate account of your cash positions.

target.mrk: 可使用此应用将日内备忘录与预测现金流进行对账。
使您能够及时识别未完成付款以及未知付款。
有助于您去除预测中的重复项目，从而更准确地了解您的现金头寸。
